section.p: This method allows the audience of a `LIVE_BROADCASTING` channel to switch to a different channel.
After successfully calling the party to switch channels, the local will first receive the callback for leaving the original channel, and then the callback for successfully joining the new channel.

Once the user switches to another channel, the user subscribes to the audio and video streams of all the other users in the channel by default, giving rise to usage and billing calculation. If you do not want to subscribe to a specified stream or all remote streams, call the mute methods accordingly.

pd.p:
The token generated at your server.
If the user uses a static App ID, token is optional and can be set as .
High security requirements: Set the value to the Token generated from your server. If you enable the App Certificate, you must use a token to join the channel.
Ensure that the App ID used for creating the token is the same App ID used by the method for initializing the RTC engine. Otherwise, the CDN live streaming may fail.

The channel name. The students attend the teacher's online class. Under the premise of the same App ID, users who fill in the same channelId will enter the same channel for audio and video interaction. The string length must be less than 64 bytes. Supported characters:
All lowercase English letters: a to z.
All uppercase English letters: A to Z.
All numeric characters: 0 to 9.
Space
"!"、"#"、"$"、"%"、"&"、"("、")"、"+"、"-"、":"、";"、"<"、"="、"."、">"、"?"、"@"、"["、"]"、"^"、"_"、"{"、"}"、"|"、"~"、","

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-1(ERR_FAILED): A general error occurs (no specified reason).
-2 (ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT): The parameter is invalid.
-5(ERR_REFUSED): The request is rejected. The role of the remote user is `AUDIENCE`.
-7(ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED): The SDK is not initialized.
-102(ERR_INVALID CHANNEL_NAME): The channel name is invalid. Please rejoin the channel with a valid channel name.
-113(ERR_NOT_IN_CHANNEL): The user is not in the channel.
